translation.en: [Amberley] Time in the alley feels like a lifetime.
translation.zh: 在小道上等待入场的时间非常漫长
那是我仪式开始的地方

translation.en: Think through my run, what it needs to look like,
translation.zh: （小马裤牛仔竞技科罗拉多州普韦布洛） 思考着在跑动时 需要有何种模样

translation.en: -Get Power and I in sync. -[horse breathes heavily]
translation.zh: 让我的马“力量”与我同步

translation.en: Some riders cut out all the noise in the arena,
translation.zh: 有些骑手在场内会排除一些杂音

translation.en: hearing only their own breath and the breath of their horse.
translation.zh: 只听自己和马儿的呼吸声

translation.en: [announcer over speaker] And now, coming for the national Little Britches finals,
translation.zh: 现在进入全国小马裤决赛赛场的

translation.en: this young lady is already standing near the top
translation.zh: 这位年轻姑娘已经在所有类别第一轮比赛中

translation.en: in the first round in all the categories.
On her way to legend status,

translation.zh: 我们可以的 好兄弟

translation.en: [Amberley] You gotta blast out of the alley,
pick up as much speed as possible before you cross the eye.
translation.zh: 在穿过电子眼之前尽可能加速

translation.en: Standard barrel pattern. Sixty feet to the first barrel.
translation.zh: 桶的摆放很标准十八米后是第一个桶

translation.en: Ninety feet to the second barrel. Crowd cheers me on.
translation.zh: 27米后是第二个桶 人群向我欢呼

translation.en: A hundred and five to the third.
Dig in for that last sprint, the run home.
translation.zh: 接下来是全力做最后冲刺
更快 更狠 就是这样

translation.en: That time decides who take it, a saddle, a buckle, or a long drive home.
translation.zh: 耗时决定了谁人欢喜谁人愁

translation.en: Nothing but failure on your mind.
translation.zh: 输家心里只会承载失败

translation.en: [announcer] And that run will cinch it. No one can catch her now.
translation.zh: 已经确定了 已无人能追赶上她

translation.en: We now have a new Little Britches All-Around Champion,
translation.zh: 小马裤全能冠军已经诞生

translation.en: just one-tenth off her personal best.
translation.zh: 比她个人最好成绩只差十分之一

translation.en: One-tenth! I should have pushed him harder.
translation.zh: 差了十分之一！我该更加努力推它一把的

translation.en: [Tina] Am, you won! You pulled a check.
translation.zh: 小安 你赢了 你拿到奖金了

translation.en: Should have been faster on that second barrel.
translation.zh: 在第二个桶那里应该更快的

translation.en: Mom, I'm not fast enough if I'm gonna go pro.
translation.zh: 妈 要做职业选手 我还不够快

translation.en: I know, but can we just enjoy this for a minute, for one minute?
translation.zh: 我知道 但我们能享受这一分钟吗？

translation.en: Now, go pick up your saddle and congratulate Autumn.
translation.zh: 现在去收起马鞍 祝贺奥塔

translation.en: Your sister won the all-around too.
translation.zh: 你妹妹也赢下了全能赛

translation.en: -[giggles] -Yeah! Get over here, you little winner!
translation.zh: 好棒 快过来 小赢家
加油 小安 继续

translation.en: -[Autumn] Come on! Bring it home! -[JC] Keep going!
translation.zh: -小安 加油 回来这里吧-继续加油

translation.en: 17.4! These are great times, Am. He is so fast.
translation.zh: 17.4秒 很不错 小安 它速度很快

translation.en: Yeah, we can shave some off of that.
translation.zh: 嗯 时间还可以更短一些

translation.en: [Tina] Gotta make him pay attention. Tell him where to go.
translation.zh: 要让它集中注意力 指导它的方向

translation.en: Gotta get him snappier on the backside.
translation.zh: 后面让它动得更快一些

translation.en: You sure you can leave him?
You two are working so well together.
Mamacita, it's two weeks working retail at the National Western Stock Show.
translation.zh: 妈咪 我就是去西部牛仔节卖两周东西

translation.en: I need that money for my pro permit.
translation.zh: 为了职业赛许可 我需要这笔钱

translation.en: Hey, you really tightened the pocket on that last barrel.
translation.zh: 你在最后一个桶上确实有进步

translation.en: You can stay on that when you get back.
translation.zh: 回来之后也要继续保持
记住 我就指望你了

translation.en: We have our leadership conference coming up.
translation.zh: 我们马上就有领导力会议

translation.en: This is important. Future Farmers of America is...
translation.zh: 那很重要 美国未来农场主协会……

translation.en: Amberley, the world can revolve without you.
translation.zh: 安柏丽 世界没了你不会停转

translation.en: -Emmy, this is our ticket to scholarships. -Scholarships.
translation.zh: -艾米 奖学金就靠这个了-奖学金

translation.en: Speaking of, are you still going?
translation.zh: 说到这个 你还会去上学吗？

translation.en: I mean, do I need to look for a new roommate?
I can rodeo and go to school.
translation.zh: 牛仔竞技和上学不冲突

translation.en: [scoffs] You're hardly home as it is.
You missed all your sister's rodeos, every one of your brother's ballgames.
translation.zh: 你错过了妹妹所有的牛仔竞技错过了弟弟每一场棒球赛

translation.en: why am I watching you, and you don't repay the favor?
translation.zh: 你都不来看我比赛我干嘛要看你比赛？

translation.en: I pitched a three-hitter last week.
You wouldn't know that, now would you?
translation.zh: 你又不知道 对不对？

translation.en: Am, please take my truck. This old F-150 can get super squirrely.
translation.zh: 小安 开我的卡车吧这台老F-150很难开

translation.en: I've been driving it all over Utah.
translation.zh: 我都开着它走遍犹他了

translation.en: Well, that doesn't make me like it.
How about if I drive you to Denver, and then I'll take a plane back?
translation.zh: 要不我开车送你去丹佛然后我坐飞机回来？
我自己开车 就这样

translation.en: you've had me at this my whole life.
translation.zh: 我一直都是这样过来的

translation.en: I could ride a horse before I could walk.
translation.zh: 在会走路前 我就会骑马了

translation.en: If we play this right, we have a real shot at Rookie of the Year.
translation.zh: 如果顺利的话我们非常有可能拿下最佳新人奖

translation.en: I could even make a run at The American.
translation.zh: 我甚至还能参加全美牛仔竞技大赛

translation.en: What I know is I can't stop you.
translation.zh: 我知道的是我拦不住你

translation.en: Can't go out there and hit the ball for them.
translation.zh: 总不能出去替他们打球

translation.en: Yeah, managing is different than playing, huh?
translation.zh: 是啊 做管理跟做球员很不一样哦？

translation.en: Riding Power one more time before you go?
You know I've got you in my heart.
translation.zh: 你知道我心里一直挂念你

translation.en: And I'll be home next month.
translation.zh: 而且我下个月就回家了

translation.en: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
translation.zh: 有天赋不勤奋 不如没天赋很勤奋

translation.en: Hey, why don't you let me brush Power, and I'll put him away,
translation.zh: 不然我去刷洗“力量” 带它回马厩

translation.en: and then you can hit the road?
No, we got riding to do.
translation.zh: 不用 我还要骑一骑呢

translation.en: text me when you stop for gas.
translation.zh: 停车加油时 给我发短信

translation.en: Text me when you stop for food.
translation.zh: 停车吃东西时 给我发短信

translation.en: I want you to call me when you get to the hotel obviously.
translation.zh: 当然 到了旅馆 要给我打电话

translation.en: -Call me in the morning when you wake up. -'Cita, chill.
translation.zh: -早上醒来时也要给我电话-妈咪 淡定啦

translation.en: I know. It's just my baby girl has grown up, and...
translation.zh: 我知道的只是我的宝贝女儿已经长大了

translation.en: Come on, Power. You and me.
translation.zh: 来吧 力量 我们跑一趟

translation.en: We're on I-80 east of Rawlins.
translation.zh: 我们在罗林斯东边的80号公路

translation.en: Look, you gotta get here fast.
Maybe I should try to get up.

translation.zh: 去找的我灰色的行李箱

translation.en: My arm is tired. I need to lean on it.
translation.zh: 我胳膊好累 需要放在上面

translation.en: -I'll be right back. -[siren wails in distance]
There's a blue blanket in my front seat.
translation.zh: 车前座里有条蓝色的毯子

translation.en: All right, miss, my name is Officer Brad Shervick.
translation.zh: 好了 小姐 我是布拉德·谢维克警官

translation.en: You've been in an accident, okay? What city do you live in?
translation.zh: 你出了车祸 你住在哪里？
好了 你还清醒 这样很好

translation.en: You got a pretty good cut on your forehead.
I need to call my dad.
Am, it's going to be okay.
Yeah, you need to call Mom and tell her, okay?
translation.zh: 嗯 你要打电话告诉妈妈 好吗？

translation.en: You're alive. You're talking to me.
translation.zh: 你还活着 还在跟我说话

translation.en: Miss, I'm gonna need you to put the phone away
translation.zh: 小姐 需要你把电话收起来

translation.en: and concentrate on me. You can call him back.
translation.zh: 集中精力听我说话你待会可以给他打回去

translation.en: Hey, Dad, the paramedics are here, so I gotta go.
translation.zh: 爸 医疗人员来了 我得挂了

translation.en: [Cory over phone] Let me talk to them.
Sir, your daughter is conscious and alert at the moment.
translation.zh: 先生 你女儿此刻意识清醒

translation.en: That's all I can tell you.
We're going to be taking her to Carbon County Memorial at Rawlins.
translation.zh: 我们会带她去罗林斯的卡本县纪念医院

translation.en: [Bill] I'm gonna stabilize you and pull you
translation.zh: 我会稳定住你 把你拉出来一点

translation.en: forward a little bit, so please just try to remain calm and still.
translation.zh: 我会稳定住你 把你拉出来一点 请尽量保持镇定 不要动

translation.en: never been in a hospital. I've never had an IV.
translation.zh: 从没住过院 打过静脉注射

translation.en: Well, you're about to have a lot of them.
translation.zh: 好吧 接下来少不了这些

translation.en: I'm gonna pull you forward, okay?
Put your mom on the phone.
-[JC] Dad, what's wrong? -Put your mom on the phone.
translation.zh: -爸 什么事？-让你妈接电话

translation.en: I'm going to Rawlins. I'm going to the hospital in Rawlins.
translation.zh: 我要去罗林斯 去罗林斯的医院
-我必须去-妈 你还没换衣服

translation.en: You don't even have shoes on.
I'm gonna go get some clothes.
I'm gonna call Stacey. She's gotta come with me.
translation.zh: 我给史黛西打电话 她和我一起去

translation.en: I need you to stay and take care of the family, okay?
translation.zh: 你要留下来 照顾家里 好吗？

translation.en: -I'll call Ashley. -I'm gonna go kiss my babies.
translation.zh: -我给艾什莉打电话-我去亲亲我的宝宝们

translation.en: Single MVA victim with possible severe spine injury.
translation.zh: 车祸受害人 脊柱可能严重损伤

translation.en: Patient awake and alert. I need vitals.
translation.zh: 病人意识清醒 我需要生命体征数据

translation.en: [Cory over phone] They're flying her to Casper Wyoming Med.
translation.zh: 会用飞机把她送到卡斯柏的怀俄明医疗中心

translation.en: They have the best doctors there.
I'll text you when I know more. Thanks.
translation.zh: 我有更多信息会给你短信 谢了

translation.en: Thank you, Stacey. Thank you for this.
Tina, you're family. Anything you need, I'm here.
translation.zh: 蒂娜 你就像家人一样有任何需要 我都支持你

translation.en: Am texted me this sunrise this morning.
translation.zh: 小安今早发了日出照片给我

translation.en: It had to be right before the...
translation.zh: 肯定之后不久就发生了……

translation.en: I didn't tell her that I loved her.
translation.zh: 我没跟她说 我爱她

translation.en: I'll be with you on that plane to Casper.
translation.zh: 去往卡斯珀的飞机上 我会陪着你

translation.en: -That can't be... -[Stacey] Oh, Tina! Oh, no!
translation.zh: -那不可能是……-蒂娜 不是吧

translation.en: [Tina] Stacey, pull over. Stacey, pull the car over!
Hi. I'm looking for Amberley Snyder. I'm her mother.
translation.zh: 你好 我在找安柏丽·史奈德我是她母亲

translation.en: She just got out of surgery. The doctor will update you.
translation.zh: 她刚刚结束手术 医生会告诉你情况

translation.en: We had to open up her spine and attach two titanium rods
translation.zh: 我们打开了她的脊椎附上了两根钛棒

translation.en: Mrs. Snyder, your daughter's T12 vertebrae was crushed,
translation.zh: 史奈德夫人 你女儿T12椎体损毁

translation.en: We pieced together what we could.
translation.zh: 我们尽可能地进行了拼合

translation.en: [gasps] I don't know what that means.
translation.zh: 我不知道那是什么意思

translation.en: It appears that the spinal cord isn't completely severed.
translation.zh: 脊髓似乎并没有被完全切断
好吧 所以依然完好？

translation.en: Well, Mrs. Snyder, even with that,
translation.zh: 史奈德 即使是这样

translation.en: she'll be confined to a wheelchair for the rest of her life.
translation.zh: 她下半辈子也要在轮椅上度过了

translation.en: [cries] You don't know my Am. You don't know her, so...
translation.zh: 你不了解小安 你不了解她……

translation.en: Mrs. Snyder, the paralysis, it's permanent.
translation.zh: 史奈德夫人 瘫痪是永久的

translation.en: Please can you just stop and take me to her right now?
translation.zh: 请你不要说了 带我去看她吧？

translation.en: -Please just take me to my daughter. -Yes, ma'am, right this way.
translation.zh: -请带我去看我女儿-好的 女士 这边走

translation.en: If you need anything, we'll be right outside.
translation.zh: 我们就在外面 有需要就叫我们

translation.en: I'm sorry it took me so long to get here.
translation.zh: 抱歉我花了这么久才到

translation.en: God, please make my child whole.
translation.zh: 上帝 请让我的孩子完好无缺
求你了 帮帮我的宝贝
科里 今天是圣诞前夕

translation.en: and the kids are inside opening presents, and we're missing it.
translation.zh: 孩子们都在屋里打开礼物我们错过这一刻了
是啊 爸 而且外面很冷

translation.en: Cold is not good for horses. They need to be warmed up.
translation.zh: 寒冷对马儿不好 要让它们暖和起来
-今天早上它们都被骑过了-是吗？

translation.en: That's a lot of horse for a little girl.
translation.zh: 这马对小女孩来说太大了
她可不是一般的小女孩
嘿 宝贝 我在这里

translation.en: I got you. I got you, baby.
I got you. Look at you. You're up.
translation.zh: 有我呢 看 你醒了

translation.en: I'm so happy to see you.
translation.zh: 见到你 我真的很高兴

translation.en: Daddy is coming. Everybody is so, so excited to see you.
translation.zh: 爸爸在过来大家都非常非常激动想见你

translation.en: [cries] Honey, I'm sorry. You're paralyzed, baby.
translation.zh: 宝贝 很对不起 你瘫痪了
我懂的 真是对不起

translation.en: It's gonna be okay. I promise.

translation.zh: -不要啊-我知道 真的对不起
在外面这里 我可以一团糟

translation.en: We both have to keep it together when we're in there, but...
translation.zh: 但进去病房 我们都要振作起来

translation.en: I don't know. It's so hard.
I got a call from the insurance company.
translation.zh: 保险公司给我打电话了

translation.en: They said now that Am is through with her operations...
translation.zh: 他们说小安开车操作没问题

translation.en: That's great. Now, she can go into rehab.
translation.zh: 太好了 现在她就能开始做康复了

translation.en: Except... she can only be transported by air.
translation.zh: 只是 她只能通过飞机来运送

translation.en: They won't pay to fly her back to Provo.
translation.zh: 飞回普罗沃的费用 他们不支付

translation.en: It's 25 grand, and I'm not playing for the Dodgers.
translation.zh: 要花两万五 我又不是富豪

translation.en: It's six weeks. Rehab is six weeks. She has to be by her family.
translation.zh: 康复要六周 她得有家人陪着
我们会想到办法的 好吗？

translation.en: I'm not really in the mood, Mom.
translation.zh: 我现在真没心情 妈

translation.en: That they don't know who or what they're dealing with.
translation.zh: 说他们不知道眼前是什么人或什么病

translation.en: I'm full of steel. You're not going to hurt me.
translation.zh: 我全身都是金属 你伤不到我的

translation.en: She's got a drive like I never had.
translation.zh: 她的这份斗志 我从未有过

translation.en: Looks like that girls is not stopping till she gets to the NFR.
translation.zh: 就好像不打入国家决赛就不会罢休

translation.en: National Finals? She's got college in the fall.
translation.zh: 国家决赛？她秋天就要上大学了

translation.en: [clicks tongue] We start Saturday morning. Be here at 7:00 a.m.
translation.zh: 周六早上开始 7点钟到这里
要是迟到 就此结束

translation.en: Everybody is here to see you.
Mom, I can't. I'm too tired.
translation.zh: 妈 我不行 我太累了

translation.en: Please just get me out of here.
-Cory, who are all these people? -[crowd cheer]
translation.zh: 科里 这些都是什么人？

translation.en: [Cory] They're all here to support our girl.
translation.zh: 他们都是来支持咱们女儿的

translation.en: MLB Players' Assistance Team, they donated to pay for the flight.
translation.zh: 职棒大联盟球员协助队捐款资助了这次航行

translation.en: Yeah, they helped with this also.
she can't handle that right now. I gotta get her to the hospital.
translation.zh: 她现在处理不了这个我得带她去医院

translation.en: I'll take care of it, kid.

translation.zh: 女士 我们准备好了

translation.en: You're a good man, Cory Snyder.
translation.zh: 你是个好人 科里·史奈德
我一直都跟你这样说啊

translation.en: Oh, no, sweet pea, we must rotate our body every two hours,
translation.zh: 不行的 宝贝我们必须每两个小时转动一下身体

translation.en: or we will get pressure sores, and we don't want that.
translation.zh: 不然会有褥疮 那样可不好

translation.en: Somebody needs to roll you too?
translation.zh: 你也要人来帮你转动身体？

translation.en: Why don't you show me how to do that?
Now, no, what would you have me do if I showed you how to do my job?
translation.zh: 不行 要是教会你 那我做什么？

translation.en: Well, I'm here 24/7. I can haul 100 bales of hay.
translation.zh: 我全天候都在这里 搬得动100捆干草

translation.en: Mom, you gotta go work the horses.
translation.zh: 妈 你得去照顾那些马
不用 大家都在出力帮忙

translation.en: Well, you don't need to stay here.
translation.zh: 好吧 那你也不用待在这里

translation.en: Face it. You're stuck with me.
translation.zh: 接受现实吧 你甩不掉我的

translation.en: I'll check in on you later.
We are going to get ourselves right out of your hair.
translation.zh: 我们现在就先不烦你了
处处都有福佑 孩子

translation.en: Sometimes a little tough to see.
Come on, Am. Let's go! Dig!
translation.zh: 加油 小安 加油

translation.en: That puts Amberley Snyder in second place. Give her a round of applause.
translation.zh: 安柏丽·史奈德获得亚军 掌声鼓励
爸 她就差那么一点

translation.en: You got some work to do.
We should have beaten that time. Power really fought me.
translation.zh: 我们该破这记录的“力量”不听我的话

translation.en: You want to be the best,
we want to build up our strength and our balance.
Go ahead and lock your wheels for me.
And you can go ahead and lift your legs out of your leg rests.
translation.zh: 腿也可以从支托里抬起来

translation.en: Now, some tools that really help us to speed along our work:
translation.zh: 有些工具能让我们进展更快
集中注意 设定目标

translation.en: So, let's start with the easy ones. What are things you see yourself doing?
translation.zh: 我们从简单的开始你想要自己做哪些事情？
这个简单 走路 骑马 牛仔竞技

translation.en: My daughter, not one to hold back.
translation.zh: 我女儿是不会退缩的人
嗯 非常有雄心的目标
我喜欢接受挑战 好的

translation.en: So, what we wanna do is we wanna get into a standing position.
So, go ahead and grab a bar with each arm, okay?
translation.zh: 用手抓住两边的杆 好吗？

translation.en: You're gonna use that upper body strength to pull yourself up.
translation.zh: 你要用上半身力量让自己站起来

translation.en: Now, this first time, I'm gonna be doing the majority of the work, all right?
translation.zh: 第一次 我会出大部分的力 好吗？

translation.en: So, on the count of three, we're gonna rock,
translation.zh: 数到三 我们会有很棒的结果

translation.en: and we're gonna get you up.
Nope, these are your hips. I'm at your hips.
translation.zh: 没有 那是你的髋部 我的手在髋部

translation.en: Diego, it looks like you're touching my daughter's butt.
translation.zh: 迭戈 看起来你就是在摸我女儿屁股

translation.en: Ma'am, this is part of what we have...
translation.zh: 女士 这一部分是我们……

translation.en: I see how it is here. You two are funny.
translation.zh: 我明白了 你们俩真会说笑

translation.en: All right, I'm putting you down, all right? Come on.
translation.zh: 好了 我要放你下来

translation.en: you're gonna do the majority of the work.
You might not get standing all the way up, and that's okay.
translation.zh: 也许你不能一路站起来 那也没事

translation.en: We just want to build up that upper body strength, okay?
translation.zh: 我们只是要建立起你上半身的力量

translation.en: All right, same thing. We're gonna go on the count of three.
translation.zh: 好了 我们同样还是数到三

translation.en: Give it all you got. Ready?
translation.zh: 全力以赴 准备好了？

translation.en: Yep, try to stand. Come on.
translation.zh: 嗯 努力站起来 加油

translation.en: We're gonna make a little progress every day, yeah?
translation.zh: 我们每天都会进步一点点 好吗？

translation.en: We're gonna do this together, okay? You gotta wait for me.
translation.zh: 我们一起来 好吗？你得等着我

translation.en: There you go. You go this. Keep going.
translation.zh: 没错 你可以的 继续

translation.en: No, she's doing really good. Do you wanna stop?
translation.zh: 不用 她进展很好 你想停止吗？
抱歉 宝贝 没事的

translation.en: Your dad is getting everything ready at the house.
translation.zh: 你爸在让家里准备就绪

translation.en: He's even putting in a custom elevator in the pantry.
translation.zh: 他甚至在食品储藏室里装了电梯

translation.en: And Autumn is so excited to see you. Everyone is.
translation.zh: 奥塔很激动想见你 大家都是

translation.en: Oh, and before I forget, this kid, Tate Watkins, keeps emailing.
translation.zh: 对了 差点忘了 一个叫塔特·沃金思的孩子一直发电邮

translation.en: You had that FFA speech scheduled for the end of next month.
translation.zh: 你下个月底安排有一场美国未来农场主协会的发言

translation.en: You have to cancel it. I can't.
translation.zh: 你得取消掉 我去不了

translation.en: No, yeah. I mean, that's what I told him.
translation.zh: 是啊 我也是这样跟他说的

translation.en: But this kid is funny. He really wants you there.
translation.zh: 但这孩子可有意思了他很希望你出席

translation.en: He said he's going to be re-schedule it for when you get better.
translation.zh: 他说等你好起来了再重新安排

translation.en: Oh! When am I gonna get better?
I'm not going in this thing.
Dad is picking up Taylor and Aubrey.
translation.zh: 爸爸去接泰勒和奥伯利了

translation.en: Yeah, they'll be here in, like, 15 minutes.
I got right back on him.
[Diego] Okay, it's all in the technique.
translation.zh: 好了 这里全依赖技巧

translation.en: You want to grab on the push rim
as far back as you can without overextending your shoulders.
translation.zh: 尽可能往后 但不要过度伸展肩膀

translation.en: When you're first starting out, you can cheat a little bit
translation.zh: 一开始时 你可以作弊一下

translation.en: -and grab the tire and-- -Okay! -[laughs] -[Amberly] I get it. Go.
translation.zh: -抓住轮胎 推动推圈-好 我知道了 上吧

translation.en: Really? You think you can do better?
translation.zh: 真的？你觉得能做得更好？
-接受挑战-给他看看 小安

translation.en: Am! Am! Am! You got it! You got this.
-I can do it. -I got you. It's okay. Let go.
translation.zh: -我能行-我来了 没事的 放手吧
嘿 练习之后就好了

translation.en: Look, it's not just about your arms. It's about your balance too.
translation.zh: 重点不在于手臂 也在于平衡

translation.en: You've been using your legs to balance your entire life.
translation.zh: 你之前一直都是用腿进行平衡

translation.en: Now, as you start to do more stuff for yourself,
translation.zh: 现在你在独立行事的过程中

translation.en: you're gonna find things that once came naturally are now difficult,
translation.zh: 你会发现以前一些很自然的事现在却很难做到

translation.en: and that's okay. That's what we're gonna work through.
translation.zh: 这样没关系的我们要克服的就是这个问题

translation.en: [sighs] Diego tells me you canceled therapy.
translation.zh: 迭戈告诉我 你取消了治疗
我19岁生日要在这里过了

translation.en: I'm stuck in that chair for the rest of my life.
translation.zh: 我下半辈子都要坐在那把轮椅里了

translation.en: Okay, I know. I get it.
I am so sick of you feeling sorry for yourself.
How long did it take you and Power to put together a good barrel run?
translation.zh: 你和“力量”花了多久才跑出了完美的骑马绕桶？
-但那不一样-不 是一样的

translation.en: Now, get in. You're going to therapy.
[Cory] Diego said you were having balance issues.
translation.zh: 迭戈说你有些平衡问题

translation.en: Remember where your balance was best?
translation.zh: 记得你在哪里平衡最佳吗？
生日快乐 宝贝女儿

translation.en: We both know that you were best in the saddle.
translation.zh: 我们都知道你在马鞍里状态最好
你就是在马鞍上学会了平衡

translation.en: Am, if it's not to ride again, so be it.
translation.zh: 小安 如果你再也骑不了马那也没关系

translation.en: But it won't be because you didn't try.
translation.zh: 但总要先试一试才知道
一 二 三 好

translation.en: Use your upper body position to find your balance.
translation.zh: 上半身姿势可以找到平衡吗？

translation.en: When I come back, you better have those shoes on.
translation.zh: 我回来时 你最好把鞋穿上

translation.en: [Felice] You better be glad that missed.

translation.zh: 那是塔克·摩根 对吧？

translation.en: You know, that boy is trying my last damn nerve.
He refuses to talk to anyone.

translation.zh: 我是安柏丽 你还好吗？

translation.en: But I know it's not fine.
And I know it's not good. I mean...

translation.zh: 那位护士 我的家人

translation.en: all they wanted to hear was that I was fine.
translation.zh: 他们都希望听到我说我还好

translation.en: inside, I knew how bad it was.
I used to feel that way.
I can't do anything for myself anymore.
translation.zh: 我不能再为自己做任何事

translation.en: [Amberley] I used to throw a saddle on my horse and ride all day.
translation.zh: 我过去常常给马上鞍 一骑就是一天

translation.en: Got better for me when I started therapy
translation.zh: 开始治疗后 我好了很多

translation.en: You're still never gonna walk again.
translation.zh: 你永远都还是走不了路

translation.en: I am gonna get on a horse again.
Eight seconds on a bull, but...
translation.zh: 在公牛背上坚持八秒 不过……

translation.en: Everybody got their money for the lotto? We are going to win this time.
translation.zh: 大家都买彩票了吗？我们这次要赢

translation.en: Wow, well... you've been a handful.
translation.zh: 好吧 你可没少给我惹麻烦

translation.en: [laughs] Honey, this is what I've been blessed with.
translation.zh: 宝贝 这是我的天赋所在

translation.en: Now, you go on home and get your glory.
translation.zh: 你现在回家 获得自己的荣誉吧

translation.en: [Tina] Felice, thank you. We never could have done this without you.
translation.zh: 费莉丝 谢谢你没有你可不知道该怎么办
就好像我是要毕业了一样

translation.en: And remember that going up is your biggest threat, okay?
translation.zh: 记住 最大的挑战在于站起来

translation.en: -Get that momentum. Pop a wheelie-- -I know.

translation.zh: 迭戈 你一直都很棒

translation.en: no matter what life gives you...
[Diego] So, why don't we talk about the things that you see yourself doing?
translation.zh: 你来说说看你想做什么吧

translation.en: 'Cause if we have a goal, you keep picturing it in your mind,
translation.zh: 因为如果有了目标你就能一直在心里想着

translation.en: you can stay focused on it.
[Amberley] Mom, I don't think I'm ready for this.
translation.zh: 妈 我觉得我还没准备好

translation.en: Just your dad. Ashley took everyone to dinner.
translation.zh: 就你爸在家艾什莉带其他人去吃晚餐了
欢迎回家 宝贝女儿

translation.en: -[Tina] Hey, you wanna get that chair? -Sure.
I'm headed out. I've gotta go pick up Aubrey from dance.
translation.zh: 我出门了 要去舞蹈课接奥伯利

translation.en: I wish I could saddle you up and just go for a ride, you and me.
translation.zh: 我希望可以给你上鞍骑着跑一跑 就你和我
喂 我是蒂娜·史奈德

translation.en: Go on and leave a message, and you have a blessed day.
translation.zh: 请留言吧愿你一天幸福

translation.en: Hey, Mom, just curious when you're coming home.
translation.zh: 妈 我只是在想你什么时候回家

translation.en: Look at that. My plan worked. Leaving the horses out.
translation.zh: 看看 我把马儿留在外面 计划奏效了
我朝你挥手是叫你过来

translation.en: I was stuck. You couldn't tell?
translation.zh: 我被困住了 你看不出来吗？

translation.en: I was so happy to see you with those horses.
translation.zh: 我看到你和马儿在一起 太高兴了

translation.en: And I'm going to be here for both of us until you can be there for yourself.
translation.zh: 我会在这里支持我们俩直到你能够自己照顾好自己
你能向我保证一件事吗？

translation.en: If I have to strap you in that saddle myself.
translation.zh: 必要的话 我会亲自把你绑在马鞍上

translation.en: Are you seriously asking me that?

translation.zh: -好棒 安柏丽-加油 小安

translation.en: -[Emmy] Yeah, Am! -[Ashley] You got this, Am!
translation.zh: -好棒 小安-你可以的 小安

translation.en: What's wrong? Don't you wanna go in the arena?
Hey, you'll have to give this a chance.
It's never gonna be the same.
translation.zh: 永远不会跟以前一样了

translation.en: I could tell the second I got up here.
There's nothing I can do about it.
All right, that's gonna be enough for today.
[Autumn] No, I wanna see you ride more.
translation.zh: 不要 我想看你骑更久

translation.en: [Emmy] You know that was just the first time out, right?
translation.zh: 你知道这只是第一次吧？

translation.en: I still see the same girl I knew before the accident.
translation.zh: 看到的还是事故前的那个姑娘

translation.en: The Amberley I know wouldn't be beaten
translation.zh: 我认识的安柏丽在用尽全力之前

translation.en: until she'd done absolutely everything she could first.
[Autumn] She's hardly been down here with the horses.
translation.zh: 她都不怎么来这里找马儿

translation.en: Autumn, you gotta give her some time.
translation.zh: 奥塔 你要给她时间

translation.en: Until then, these horses aren't gonna clean up after themselves.
translation.zh: 在此之前 这些马儿可不会自行清理

translation.en: Go on. Go get the wheelbarrow.
translation.zh: 去吧 把手推车弄来

translation.en: [Amberley] Why won't you leave me alone?

translation.zh: 塔特 早上好 我是安柏丽·史奈德
没有 没事 我醒着呢

translation.en: Yeah, you need to stop emailing me.
and you need to stop reminding me of stuff I can't do.
translation.zh: 你也不必再提醒我那些我做不了的事
慢点说 我们谈谈吧

translation.en: Sitting third in the standings for our circuit.
translation.zh: 在我们巡回赛里排名第三
做有马鞍骑乘的人都是疯子
不会 只是头脑冷静而已

translation.en: Before, every time on a horse,
it felt like the most natural thing in the world.
translation.zh: 都感觉像是世上最自然的事
现在 这种感觉没了

translation.en: I can't do the one thing that I love to do.
translation.zh: 我做不了我爱做的事了

translation.en: Maybe you could do something other than rodeo.
translation.zh: 也许你能做些牛仔竞技之外的事
牛仔竞技不只是一件事

translation.en: Really, it's who I am. It's like...
translation.zh: 而是我的灵魂所在 就像是……

translation.en: I just gotta find a way to wrap my mind around this new reality.
translation.zh: 我只是需要想办法在心里接受这个新的现实

translation.en: [Cory] Am, I'm home! Come on outside.
translation.zh: 小安 我回来了 出来外面吧

translation.en: Doctor said you should be ready to start driving.
translation.zh: 医生说你应该准备好重新开车了

translation.en: It's set up with hand controls and everything.
translation.zh: 手臂控制什么的都已经设置好了

translation.en: What? Mom, I can handle this.
translation.zh: 怎么？妈 我应付得来

translation.en: Let me show you how it works.
Are you sure you don't want us to go with you?
translation.zh: 你确定不用我们和你一起？

translation.en: ♪ Odds are, you don't beat the odds ♪ ♪ But they don't know the thing we've got... ♪
[Amberley] It's all about keeping my balance.
translation.zh: 重点在于保持我的平衡

translation.en: A seatbelt on a saddle. That is a new one on me.
translation.zh: 马鞍上有安全带 这对我是新鲜事

translation.en: Well, I figure you can attach it behind the cantle.
translation.zh: 我想可以连在鞍尾后面

translation.en: You think you can do that?
A seatbelt, it's what put me in this chair.
translation.zh: 我坐上轮椅 是因为安全带

translation.en: It might be what gets me out.
translation.zh: 也许它也能让我离开轮椅
我给咱们准备了点东西

translation.en: I know it's new now, but...
translation.zh: 我知道跟以前不一样 可是……

translation.en: Ready to be my legs, bubba?
translation.zh: 准备好成为我的双腿了吗 好兄弟？

translation.en: Sweetest bale of hay I ever tossed.
translation.zh: 这是我举起过的最甜美的一捆干草

translation.en: Let's take it easy. I'm still not sold on this seat belt.
translation.zh: 慢慢来 我还是不大相信这安全带

translation.en: [Tina] You're gonna have to make him work without leg cues.
translation.zh: 你得让它在你双腿不发信号的情况下工作

translation.en: I get this down, and I can start training again.
translation.zh: 完成这一点 我就能开始训练了

translation.en: I was talking to Stacey, and we had this idea.
translation.zh: 我之前跟史黛西聊天 有了个想法

translation.en: To get me ready to run?
Hey, Am, you have the gift. You've had it since before you could even walk, but...
translation.zh: 小安 你有这份天赋在你没学会走路前就有了 但是……

translation.en: Yes, but you could also coach.
translation.zh: 对 但你也可以去教骑马

translation.en: Stacey says that she needs you. You could help her with the kids.
translation.zh: 史黛西说她需要你你可以帮她教那些孩子

translation.en: -Autumn is working with her now. -Oh, good for her!
translation.zh: -奥塔现在正在帮她-对她挺好的

translation.en: Yeah, but it might be a good way to just get you--
translation.zh: 嗯 但或许这能让你很好地……

translation.en: Stacey needs you. Autumn needs you.
translation.zh: 史黛西需要你 奥塔需要你

translation.en: You could take those riders to a new level.
translation.zh: 你可以让那些骑手更上一层楼

translation.en: What? You're telling me that God wants me like this?
translation.zh: 你是说上帝想让我这样？

translation.en: No, honey, I think he wants what's best for you.
translation.zh: 不是的 宝贝我觉得上帝是想给你最好的

translation.en: Well, then why did he give me this talent and then yank it away?
translation.zh: 那上帝为什么给我这份天赋却又突然夺走？

translation.en: And why did he give me a mother that doesn't believe in me
translation.zh: 为什么要让我母亲对我没有信心

translation.en: and treats me like a cripple?
translation.zh: 把我像个瘸子一样对待？

translation.en: Wait. That's not what I meant.
translation.zh: 等等 我不是那个意思

translation.en: That coaching idea was wrong. I shouldn't have said--
translation.zh: 教练这个主意很糟糕 我不该说的……

translation.en: Hey, it's just gonna take some time.
translation.zh: 嘿 只是需要一些时间

translation.en: If I can't ride like I used to, I never wanna ride again.
translation.zh: 如果不能跟以前一样骑马那我永远都不要再上马

translation.en: It kills me that I can't fix this.
translation.zh: 我不能让你复原 难受得要死

translation.en: I should have died in that crash.
translation.zh: 那场车祸里 我应该死掉的

translation.en: [shouts] Hey, don't you say that! Don't you dare say that!
translation.zh: 不准这样说 你再这样说试试

translation.en: I thank God every day that you are here.
translation.zh: 你活下来 我每天都在感谢上苍

translation.en: And I know that everything is different.
translation.zh: 我知道一切都不一样了

translation.en: But we're just gonna have to find a new way to live with this.
translation.zh: 但我们只要找到新的办法适应就好

translation.en: This chair will either be your wings, or it will be your anchor.
translation.zh: 这把轮椅可以让你翱翔也可以让你止步不前

translation.en: You gonna say it like that?
[chuckles] I haven't done this a lot.
I put in all the rodeo stuff, like winning Little Britches.
translation.zh: 我还把牛仔竞技的事写上了比如赢下了小马裤牛仔竞技

translation.en: Yeah. Two saddles, finals, and world.
translation.zh: 是啊 地方赛 决赛 世界赛

translation.en: Listen, if I suck up there, you can boo me off the stage.
translation.zh: 如果我说得很烂 你可以把我嘘下台

translation.en: Oh, my God! I didn't think! I swear!
translation.zh: 天啊 我没想到这个

translation.en: There are some goals that may be out of my grasp for now.
translation.zh: 有些目标可能现在触摸不到
我在为新目标 新梦想

translation.en: [Amberley] I start Utah South in two weeks.
translation.zh: 两周后我就会开始南犹他大学的学习

translation.en: I've learned we don't always get to choose what happens to us,
translation.zh: （南犹他大学 犹他州雪松城） 我学到了 我们无法选择会发生什么

translation.en: but we do get to choose what we do next.
translation.zh: 但我们可以选择要怎样应付

translation.en: Most importantly, we never give up.
translation.zh: 最重要的是 我们决不能放弃

translation.en: I think I might just sit in on chemistry to see if I wanna...
translation.zh: 我想可以在化学课静观一下 看看……
对了 所以说 塔特……

translation.en: I don't think we're there yet.
[over phone] Amberley, Jenna Walters from American Morning.
translation.zh: 安柏丽我是美国早安的珍娜·沃特斯
别说话 是珍娜·沃特斯

translation.en: [Jenna] Listen, we'd like to do a profile piece on you.
translation.zh: 听我说 我们想对你做个专访

translation.en: People really want to hear your story,
translation.zh: 大家很想听到你的故事

translation.en: and somebody told me you were back on your horse again.
translation.zh: 有人对我说 你重新回到了马背上

translation.en: So we thought it would be very inspiring to people facing difficult situations.
translation.zh: 我们决定这非常能激励那些身处困境的人
你重新骑马了 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah, I can ride him around a little.
translation.zh: 对 能够稍微骑一骑

translation.en: I can be down there with my crew on Saturday.
translation.zh: 我周六可以带着工作人员过去

translation.en: You haven't been on your horse in two months.
translation.zh: 你都六个月没骑过马了

translation.en: And the last time you were,
you said you were never getting on your horse again.
translation.zh: 还说你再也不会回到马背上了

translation.en: I mean, are you up for this?
The doctors asked me what my goals were.

translation.zh: 走路 骑马 牛仔竞技

translation.en: [Jenna] Is there a future in rodeo?
translation.zh: 你进行牛仔竞技会有未来吗？

translation.en: Really, I'm the only one who can decide what I'm capable of.
translation.zh: 真的 只有我才能决定我能做到什么

translation.en: I've got a lot of work to do.
whatever life gives you, you've got three choices.
translation.zh: 无论生活怎样对你 你都有三个选择

translation.en: You can either give up, give in, or give it your all.
translation.zh: 放弃 屈服 或是全力以赴

translation.en: And I figured it was time that I gave it my all.
translation.zh: 我想 是时候全力以赴一把了

translation.en: It's an incredible story. We'll be watching for you.
translation.zh: 故事非常不可思议我们会密切关注你的

translation.en: -That's it. I think we've got it. -Cool.
Let's just get some B-roll of her riding, okay?
translation.zh: 我们去拍一些她骑马的片段吧

translation.en: Jenna Walters is just sitting in our barn.
translation.zh: 珍娜·沃特斯就坐在我们谷仓里

translation.en: Well, they're about to finish up,
and she's gonna get on Power, and I'm freaking out a little bit, so...
translation.zh: 她要骑上“力量” 我有点慌张

translation.en: Yes, Cory, I promise. I won't forget to breathe.
translation.zh: 嗯 科里 我保证 不会忘记呼吸的

translation.en: -[Emmy] Amberley, you got this! -[Tina] There you go.
I can't tell you what to do with my legs anymore.
translation.zh: 我不能再用腿来指示你了

translation.en: Hey, you don't wanna miss this.
[Ashley] You got it, Am. Keep going.
translation.zh: 你可以的 小安 继续

translation.en: -[Emmy] Come on, Am! -[Autumn] Come on, Am!
Mom, he's behaving like a prince.
translation.zh: 妈 它就跟王子一样
-小安 准备好了？-嗯 好的

translation.en: [announcer over speaker] Give it up for number 17, Jenny Watkins.
translation.zh: （比赛骑手） 掌声欢迎17号 珍妮·沃金思

translation.en: -Do you think Amberley will win? -Heck, yeah!
translation.zh: -你觉得安柏丽会赢吗？-当然了
我是塔特 塔特·沃金思

translation.en: What if she falls? She gets hurt?
translation.zh: 要是她摔倒怎么办？受伤怎么办？

translation.en: Hey, I'm going nuts as it is.
translation.zh: 嘿 我已经够担心的了

translation.en: Sorry. Somebody had to say it.
translation.zh: 抱歉 但这话总得有人说

translation.en: Am is just here for practice, see what she can do.
translation.zh: 小安只是来练习的 看看自己的实力

translation.en: Yeah, well, she's gonna do great.
You ask me, I say you haven't the sense God gave you!
translation.zh: 要我说 你完全没有上帝给你的意识

translation.en: Letting your handicapped child on a horse.
What kind of a mother are you?
translation.zh: 你这种人算哪门子母亲？

translation.en: I'm gonna show you what kind of a mother I am.
translation.zh: 我倒要让你看看我是哪门子母亲

translation.en: -That is none of your-- -Hey, it's all right.
[announcer] Up next, we have a real comeback kid.
translation.zh: 接下来是真正回归的孩子
就在事故发生短短几个月后

translation.en: ...ready to take her first run, Amberley Snyder on Power.
translation.zh: 她已经准备好首次骑乘有请骑在“力量”上的安柏丽·史奈德

translation.en: they said you and I would never be back here.
translation.zh: 大家说我们永远不会再回到这里

translation.en: [announcer] 17.6 seconds. Good enough for second place.
translation.zh: 17.6秒 这成绩足够获得亚军了

translation.en: What a ride, folks! What a ride!
Amberley Snyder, give it up for her one more time.
translation.zh: 安柏丽·史奈德 再次掌声鼓励
第二名 不是大输家了？

translation.en: It feels like... I don't know.
Ashley took them all out for pizza.
translation.zh: 艾什莉带大家出去吃披萨了

translation.en: Should be back in an hour or so.
I should be happy, and I am. I just...
translation.zh: 我应该高兴 我也确实高兴 只是……

translation.en: and she's here, and she's back on the horse.
translation.zh: 她在这里 重新回到了马背上

translation.en: [cries] But then I see her in that chair.
translation.zh: 但我又看到她坐轮椅的样子

translation.en: I can't... I just can't do anything.
I can't fix her. I can't protect her.
translation.zh: 我治不好她 保护不了她

translation.en: Every time I look at her, it hits me.
translation.zh: 每次看到她 我都很受打击

translation.en: [cries] I told her not to take that truck. You know, I stood there with her.
translation.zh: 我告诉她不要开那辆车当时我就站在她身边

translation.en: -And I let her go. -It's not your fault.
translation.zh: -但我还是让她开走了-不是你的错

translation.en: There's so many things she's never gonna be able to do, you know?
translation.zh: 有许多事情 她永远也做不了了

translation.en: She's never gonna be able to walk down the aisle.
translation.zh: 她永远都不可能在婚礼时走下红毯

translation.en: She's never gonna be able to run with her kids.
translation.zh: 不可能跟她的孩子一起奔跑

translation.en: She's not gonna have -the same opportunities-- -She has you.
translation.zh: -不会跟以前一样有那些机会……-她有你啊

translation.en: I say sky is the limit.
translation.zh: 我说 一切皆有可能

translation.en: [Amberley] Mom, you know I can make a faster run.
translation.zh: 妈 你知道我能跑得更快

translation.en: [Tina] I know, baby, but let's take it one rodeo at a time.
translation.zh: 我知道 宝贝 但我们一步一步来
还在恢复 但会成功的

translation.en: Got word from Andrea Busby at Busby Quarter Horses.
translation.zh: 巴斯比夸特马屋的安德里·巴斯比对我说

translation.en: They want to put you up for the Fan Favorite Exemption
translation.zh: 他们想让你参选今年全美牛仔竞技大赛的
大众最喜爱骑手豁免参赛

translation.en: but they've been following your story,
translation.zh: 但他们有一直追随你的故事

translation.en: and they want to get it started for you.
translation.zh: 想为了你而启动这一切

translation.en: Power, do you hear that? The American!
translation.zh: 力量 听到没？是全美牛仔竞技大赛

translation.en: Power is ready. Not sure about you.
translation.zh: 力量准备好了 但你就不一定了

translation.en: [Tina] The American is as big as it gets.
translation.zh: 全美牛仔竞技大赛是最盛大的比赛了

translation.en: I guess we got work to do.

translation.zh: （巴特尔芒廷牛仔竞技会内华达州里诺） 不可思议啊

translation.en: Less than a year after her truck accident,
Amberley Snyder is back with a time of 17.7 seconds.
translation.zh: 安柏丽·史奈德回归了 赛绩17.7秒
这位牛仔女郎继续给人惊喜

translation.en: She is up for the Fan Favorite Exemption at The American,
translation.zh: 她参选了全美牛仔竞技大赛的大众最喜爱骑手豁免参赛

translation.en: and she is showing us why.
translation.zh: 我们这样看得出来理由

translation.en: That's a first-place finish for Amberley Snyder.
translation.zh: 安柏丽·史奈德拿下第一名
安柏丽·史奈德获得17.42秒的成绩

translation.en: The American should make some room. Unbelievable.
translation.zh: 全美牛仔竞技大赛应该认出些位置了 真是难以置信 （州界牛仔竞技会犹他州特里蒙顿）

translation.en: [announcer 3] Give this little lady a round of applause.
translation.zh: 给这位小姑娘热烈掌声

translation.en: [announcer 4] And she's coming around the second barrel.
translation.zh: （西部最优牛仔竞技会犹他州奥格登） 她在冲向第二个桶

translation.en: That's gonna cost her a five-second penalty.
translation.zh: 处罚是比赛时间加五秒

translation.en: Putting Amberley Snyder outside of our top five riders.
translation.zh: 安柏丽·史奈德错失五强

translation.en: Well, you're gonna have to get him ready for regionals in Pocatello soon.
translation.zh: 你得让它准备好参加波卡特洛的地区赛

translation.en: We gotta get faster if I'm gonna go The American.
translation.zh: 要参加全美牛仔竞技大赛还得速度更快才行

translation.en: I must have just sat in something.
translation.zh: 肯定是坐在什么东西上了

translation.en: That's the last one unless you wanna ride the donkey.
translation.zh: 这是最后一匹了 除非你想骑驴

translation.en: [Tina] I do not know what is going on with you.
I don't know what kind of bug you got, but it's making you all wonky.
translation.zh: 我不知道你有什么不舒服但你看起来怪怪的

translation.en: I'm gonna go inside, and I'm gonna make you a protein smoothie.
translation.zh: 我进去给你做一份蛋白质奶昔

translation.en: You need to start taking better care of yourself. You know that?
translation.zh: 你要开始更好地照顾自己 明白吗？

translation.en: All right, give me your weight.
translation.zh: 好了 重心挪到我身上

translation.en: Those horses are getting hungry. Come on. Let's go.
translation.zh: 这些马也饿了 走吧

translation.en: I'll meet you inside, all right?
Hey, Mom, I don't feel very--
-[JC] Mom, what can I do? -[Tina] JC, go get the keys.
translation.zh: -妈 要我做什么？-JC 去拿钥匙

translation.en: Autumn, open the door! Open the back door!
You've got a softball-sized ulcer that goes right down to the bone.
translation.zh: 有一处垒球大小的溃烂直直抵达骨骼了

translation.en: I'll tell you, if you had waited two more days,
translation.zh: 我跟你说 要是你多等两天再来

translation.en: My kid is dying right in front of me. I don't even see it?
translation.zh: 我孩子在我眼前有生命危险而我毫不知情？

translation.en: [doctor] We've got her on IV antibiotics now,
translation.zh: 我们已经给她静脉注射抗生素了

translation.en: but we need to operate right away.
No, I've got two rodeos this weekend and a shot at The American.
translation.zh: 不行 我这周末有两场竞技而且还想参加全美牛仔竞技大赛

translation.en: This infection will kill you if we don't treat it now.
translation.zh: 这感染现在不治疗 会害死你的

translation.en: You'll need intensive wound care and be on long-term antibiotics.
translation.zh: 你需要进行密集的伤口监护而且长期使用抗生素

translation.en: What? No, then I'm not doing it. I'm not doing it.
Can I talk to my daughter alone, please?
translation.zh: 我能跟女儿单独谈谈吗？

translation.en: Let me know now, and I'll get ready to bury my child,
translation.zh: 现在就让我知道我会准备好白发人送黑发人

translation.en: I can't go through this again.
translation.zh: 我再也无法承受这个样子了

translation.en: So if you wanna kill yourself,
you're gonna put me in that box right next to you.
Why the hell did you not tell me?
translation.zh: 那你为什么不告诉我伤情？

translation.en: Am, you just have to know your limits.
translation.zh: 小安 你要知道自己的限制在哪

translation.en: No! It's all gonna go away!
translation.zh: 不要 这一切都会没了的

translation.en: Everything changed in that one moment.
translation.zh: 那一刻 一切都变了

translation.en: But then, I was me again. I was riding.
translation.zh: 但之后 我又变回了我自己我可以骑马了

translation.en: that if you knew, it would all go away.
translation.zh: 如果你知道了 那这一切就都没了
对不起 真的对不起

translation.en: One turkey sandwich, cheddar cheese and no crust.
translation.zh: 火鸡三明治 加了切达干酪切掉了面包边

translation.en: That's a ridiculous amount of fan mail.
"I'm ten and live in San Antonio, Texas.
translation.zh: “我10岁 住在得州的圣安东尼奥

translation.en: I got hit by a car and am in a wheelchair just like you.
translation.zh: 我被车撞到了 现在和你一样坐轮椅

translation.en: I used to feel like giving up, but I see what you do,
translation.zh: 我曾经万念俱灰 但我看到了你

translation.en: and it makes me want to try harder.
I can do great things too. Your fan, Brittany Carlson."
translation.zh: 我也能做到伟大的事你的粉丝 布里特妮·卡森”

translation.en: What do you want me to write back?
[Ashley] Am, there are tons of more messages like that.
translation.zh: 小安 这样的消息还有非常多

translation.en: [Aubrey] Am, maybe you could help them.
translation.zh: 小安 也许你能帮到他们
我们进入全美牛仔竞技大赛了

translation.en: Bubba, we're going to The American.
translation.zh: 好兄弟 我们能去参赛了

translation.en: Come on. Let's go this way.
[Amberley] Mom, I should drive with you.
translation.zh: 妈 我应该和你一起开车

translation.en: No, it's better you fly in tomorrow. My nerves are working enough.
translation.zh: 不用 你最好是明天坐飞机去我已经够紧张的了

translation.en: I'll make sure she gets to the airport.
Glad you got Legacy in there. Power travels better with company.
translation.zh: 幸好你有雷柯西在力量不喜欢单独在路上

translation.en: You haven't had enough time to get ready.
You've only run those barrels at competition-level three times.
translation.zh: 比赛级别的骑马绕桶你只训练过三次

translation.en: Mom, we've been over this. I feel great.
translation.zh: 妈 我们已经说过这事了 我感觉超好

translation.en: Tina, we'll get her through a couple of runs before she leaves.
translation.zh: 蒂娜 她离开前 我们会让她再跑几次

translation.en: And we'll train hard when we get to Texas.
translation.zh: 而且到了得克萨斯 我们会努力训练

translation.en: It's turning into snow. I think I might have to stop for the night.
translation.zh: 在转为下雪了 我想可能今晚得停下

translation.en: I'm sorry, honey. I know you need time to train.
translation.zh: 抱歉 宝贝 我知道你需要时间训练

translation.en: I'll see you tomorrow night.Love you.
I only have one more day.

translation.zh: 妈 如果我在这里失败

translation.en: at The American, in front of thousands of people,
translation.zh: 在全美牛仔竞技大赛在上万观众眼前

translation.en: that's gonna stick with me forever.
translation.zh: 我会永远都摆脱不掉这个污点
小安 我真的很担心

translation.en: You know that I can't quit.
translation.zh: 你知道 我不能退出

translation.en: I remember the first time I saw you riding.
translation.zh: 我记得第一次看你骑马的样子
我是说 真正的骑马

translation.en: You were maybe ten years old.
I was watching you, and I got jealous.
translation.zh: 我看着你 有点妒忌

translation.en: Oh. Such a natural gift, even then.
translation.zh: 即使是那个时候 也已经很有天赋

translation.en: the fact that you're even here after that accident...
translation.zh: 发生了事故 但依然来到了这里

translation.en: Honey, look how far you've taken yourself.
translation.zh: 宝贝 看看你自己已经有多大成就了

translation.en: If I decide to go for it,
Well, then, I'm gonna be there for you.
What are you doing here? I thought you had to work.
translation.zh: 你怎么在这？你不是要工作吗

translation.en: My buddy, Justin, he's in the team roping competition.
translation.zh: 是啊 我哥们贾斯汀要参加套牛比赛

translation.en: I'm just helping out with his horses.
Are you crazy? I wouldn't miss this for nothing.
translation.zh: 你疯了吗？我可不会错过这一刻

translation.en: [Tina] I gotta get you off there so Casey and Ryan can do final checks.
translation.zh: 我要让你下马了这样凯茜和莱恩能做最后检查

translation.en: Of course. Let me help you.
You can put me down now.
I could do that all day.
that has made me feel like I'm not in this chair.
translation.zh: 让我觉得可以脱出轮椅的人

translation.en: -All right, I guess I should put you down. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 好了 应该放你下来了

translation.en: [announcer] Welcome to the RFD-TV's The American,
translation.zh: （RFD电视台 全美牛仔竞技大赛） （AT&T体育场得克萨斯州阿灵顿） 欢迎收看RFD电视台全美牛仔竞技大赛
世上项目最丰富的一日牛仔竞技大赛

translation.en: the toughest competitors in the world will battle it out
translation.zh: 世上最厉害的选手将进行角逐

translation.en: to be the best of the best.
None of this would have happened without you.
translation.zh: 所有这一切 都要感谢你

translation.en: I'm so proud of you, Am.
translation.zh: 我非常为你骄傲 小安

translation.en: I mean, look where you are.
You may have lost the use of your legs...
but it's opened up your heart.
Now, remember. It's not about winning.
It's about the fact that you are here on this horse right now.
translation.zh: 重要的是你此刻在这里骑着这匹马

translation.en: Can it be a little about winning?
translation.zh: 可以稍微在乎一点点输赢吗？
像风一样奔驰吧 宝贝

translation.en: She's good. I'm freaking out, but...
translation.zh: 她很好 我很紧张 不过……

translation.en: but it's the same thing we always do.
translation.zh: 但这是我们一直都在做的事

translation.en: we have a Fan Favorite coming up.
translation.zh: 接下来是大众最喜爱骑手

translation.en: She's beaten incredible odds to get here.
translation.zh: 她能来到这里 就是件不可思议的事

translation.en: She's got a heart as big as Texas,
translation.zh: 她的心和得克萨斯一样大

translation.en: [Amberley] Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
translation.zh: 态度虽小 影响却很大

translation.en: I realize maybe I won't have control over every situation in my life.
translation.zh: 我意识到 也许我不能控制生命里的所有情况

translation.en: Maybe I don't get to make every decision.
translation.zh: 也许不是所有决定都由我来做

translation.en: But when I wake up in the morning, I get to decide my attitude.
translation.zh: 但每天醒来时我可以决定自己的态度

translation.en: [Amberley] And if that's the only decision I get to make that day...
translation.zh: 如果那就是我这天做的唯一决定

translation.en: I better make it a good one.
translation.zh: 那么最好是一个好的决定

translation.en: who knows what you can achieve?
translation.zh: 你能做到的事 谁也不知道

translation.en: I can't believe what we just watched. I mean, that was amazing.
translation.zh: 不敢相信我们眼前刚刚发生的事简直是太精彩了

translation.en: That puts Amberley Snyder up on the board with some of the very best in rodeo.
translation.zh: 安柏丽·史奈德的这个成绩可以与大赛中最优秀者媲美

translation.en: [Amberley] When the doctors asked what my goals were,
translation.zh: 当医生问我有什么目标时
我说：“走路 骑马 牛仔竞技”

translation.en: [female announcer] ...around the second barrel. It's just perfect.
translation.zh: 绕的第二个桶简直完美
第三个桶绕得非常完美
（2015年全美牛仔竞技大赛上安柏丽骑术斩获荣耀） 安柏丽·史奈德来了

translation.en: and she's gonna be amongst them with a 15.369.
I'm telling you what. She played at a pro level here, girls.
translation.zh: 我可以说 她这是职业级 （时至今日她依然是职业骑马绕桶选手）

translation.en: [female announcer] Getting a standing ovation here at AT&T Stadium.
♪ Ain't life crazy ? ♪ ♪ I live it like a good ride ♪
translation.zh: （她也作为励志讲者 在全国巡讲）

translation.en: ♪ I saddle up with it and smile at the sun ♪
translation.zh: （她也作为励志讲者 在全国巡讲） （安柏丽还在本片中出任自己的替身）

translation.en: ♪ Let my wild dreams run ♪ ♪ My heart knows it's going the distance ♪
translation.zh: （安柏丽还在本片中出任自己的替身）
（同时还有她的妹妹奥塔） （以及她们的马儿“力量”）

translation.en: ♪ And I ride ♪ ♪ Take the world by the reins ♪
